description: This dashboard visualizes key APK Enforcer metrics, including CPU usage, memory consumption, and garbage collector activity.

panels.description: Number of available central processing units
panels.title: Available CPUs

panels.description: This represents the amount of memory of free physical memory in the host (free = total – (used + shared + cached + buffered))
panels.title: Free Physical Memory

panels.description: Represents the current load of CPU in the host system for the last minute.
panels.title: System Load Average

panels.description: Represents the CPU load in this process
panels.title: CPU Load

panels.description: Represents the current load of CPU in the host system for the last minute.
panels.title: System Load Average (1 Min)

panels.description: Used/committed bytes of JVM memory area (heap)
panels.title: Memory Heap

panels.description: Used/committed bytes of JVM memory area (non-heap)
panels.title: Memory Non Heap

panels.description: Total number of requests in the current 5 min window
panels.title: Requests in 5 Min Window

panels.description: The number of different thread types running at the current moment
panels.title: Threads Count

panels.description: This is the number of classes that are currently loaded in the JVM
panels.title: Class Loading

panels.description: Change in the total time spent on JVM garbage collection within the specified interval
panels.title: Garbage Collection Time

panels.description: Total bytes allocated in a given JVM memory pool. Only updated after GC, not continuously.
panels.title: Memory pool - $mempool

title: APK Enforcer
